page.title: 01NORTH HAVERING
page.content: Havering has changed over the years,now it is mainly a residential borough and is situated on the east side of London.The borough is dominated by Romford which is famous for its market which is filled with bargain hunters on market days. Although there is no professional football team or county cricket ground the people have great enthusiasm for sport;the Dolphin centre is a famous aqua leisure area. Few of the people who live in Romford journey out of town to do their weekly shopping;87% use local shops and 30% use public transport. Local people like Havering and tend to stay in the area on average 23.8 years.Some things upset local people, at the top of this list are crowds, litter, poor parking facilities and a lack of things for the young to do.
